org.point85.workschedule

Class WorkSchedule

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.point85.workschedule.WorkSchedule

  • public class WorkSchedule
extends java.lang.Object
    Class WorkSchedule represents a named group of teams who collectively work one or more shifts with off-shift periods. A work schedule can have periods of non-working time.

    • Constructor Summary
